title: 9 Moreish breakfast bakes for busy mornings
text:
9 Moreish breakfast bakes for busy mornings The ideal solution for a no-time-for-breakfast scenario. 08 Oct 2019





(Image: iStock)

ALSO READ: Egg shortage: your breakfast and baking have just become a lot more costly

For the average John or Jane, cooking up a storm in the kitchen each morning before the school run and/or work is unrealistic, to say the least! Mornings are a hectic time of day for most people, but luckily breakfast can be the least of your worries (if you try our breakfast bakes, that is!)



Bakes are convenient and nutritious gifts (depending on your ingredients) from the breakfast gods. Their make-ahead quality is probably the best part as you can pop them into the oven the night before and then just reheat the next morning!



1. Breakfast cheesecake





2. Roast butternut and blue cheese frittata





ALSO READ: 5 Fabulous breakfast recipes for those of you that don't do eggs



3. Low carb breakfast spinach quiche

4. Broccoli and cream cheese quiche

5. WATCH: Sweet potato pecan breakfast bake



6. Chorizo and potato frittata





7. Naan breakfast pizza





8. Cheesy spinach and zucchini muffins





ALSO READ: 10 different ways to enjoy eggs for breakfast



9. WATCH: How to make your own, super-easy, rustic bacon and egg breakfast pie



What do you usually have for breakfast? Do you wake up at dawn to cook up breakfast storm? Do you grab leftovers from last night? Do you buy something on your way to work? Or do you skip breakfast? We'd LOVE to hear from you! Comment below or connect with us on Facebook, Twitter or tag us in your breakfasts on Instagram.



Read more on: breakfast | eggs | baking
